articles.title: Ellie Goulding surprises NHS nurse with live performance during her online wedding - The Sun
articles.content:
SINGER Ellie Goulding surprised an NHS nurse with a live performance during her online wedding.
Ellie sang Love Me Like You Do over a Zoom video call as Bristol Hospital nurse Hayley Pitman shared her first dance with new husband Harvey Skelton.
